duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish relationships with Clients, landowners, and business partners
Resolve questions relating to: JIB, A/P, Revenue, Royalty1099 reporting
Interface with Division order, Land, and accounting teams, as necessary
Help to establish reporting, Dashboards and Analytics

education_certification.credential: 3+ years in Oil and Gas with knowledge of Land, Division order, Accounting
Oil and Gas Accounting software is a big plus such as W Energy, Quorum, Bolo and others
